entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -21.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 05:36 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 80 %

Dewpoint: -24.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 36 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early this morning then clearing. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 36 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
